packages.name: iOS Microsoft Outlook
packages.releaseNotes:
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft OneNote
packages.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.

Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience. 
 
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app (OneNote->Settings->Send Feedback) 
Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

packages.name: iOS Microsoft OneDrive
packages.releaseNotes: This version of OneDrive supports iOS/iPadOS versions 17 or newer

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Windows App Mobile
packages.releaseNotes: Now you can seamlessly share files between your PC and iPhone. You can set up file sharing by linking your iPhone to your Microsoft account.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Defender Security
packages.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and improvements

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Copilot
packages.releaseNotes:
Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Check out what's new in this release:
• Direct PDF Viewing: You can now view PDFs directly within the tab without needing to download them first.
• AI-generated Page Summary: Go to Menu > Summarize to view an AI-generated page summary in a half-screen view without leaving the web page.
• Bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements.
Upgrade to the latest version and enjoy a smarter, more efficient Microsoft Edge!
Want early access to more new features? Join our Beta program at: 
https://testflight.apple.com/join/JkU2rh21

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Loop
packages.releaseNotes: • Bug fixes

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Warehouse Management
packages.releaseNotes:
This version of the Warehouse Management mobile app introduces the following fixes and improvements:
•Fixed an issue that affected the connection on devices.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Store Commerce
packages.releaseNotes:
In just two weeks, we've jam-packed this release. There's GTIN global product identifier support, and you can edit the call-to-action in Blaze campaigns.

Store setup for in-person payments is faster, receipt sent confirmations clearer, and testing Tap to Pay on iPhone is smoother. Plus, we've improved dashboard statistics and squashed some bugs.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Dynamics 365 Sales
packages.releaseNotes: This version includes experience improvements and bug fixes so sellers can stay on top of their deals better than ever before.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Lists
packages.releaseNotes:
This update contains bug fixes and stability improvements.

We would like to let our users know that we are planning on dropping support for the Lists app on iOS 16 and iPadOS 16 versions soon. Please ensure you're on one of the later versions of iOS/iPadOS (17 or 18) to make sure you're still able to access the latest version of the Lists app.


This wouldn't be possible without your feedback. If you run into any issues, please shake your device and tap "Report a Problem."

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Dynamics 365 Field Service

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Timesheet

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Viva Engage

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Whiteboard
packages.releaseNotes:
1. Fixed known bugs.
2. Support Apple Pencil Pro for pinch-to-switch focus mode.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Edge AI Browser
packages.releaseNotes:
Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Check out what's new in this release:
• Direct PDF Viewing: You can now view PDFs directly within the tab without needing to download them first.
• AI-generated Page Summary: Go to Menu > Summarize to view an AI-generated page summary in a half-screen view without leaving the web page.

Upgrade to the latest version and enjoy a smarter, more efficient Microsoft Edge!
Want early access to more new features? Join our Beta program at: 
https://testflight.apple.com/join/JkU2rh21

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Seeing AI
packages.releaseNotes:
This release includes several bug fixes to make your experience even better.

Recent improvements include:

•  Seeing AI can now describe videos! Select "Browse Photos" from the menu, or share an MP4 file with Seeing AI, and hear it described, scene-by-scene.
• You can now recognize PDF documents with Seeing AI.
• After tapping "More Info" to get a rich description of an image, you can now ask questions on the same screen.
• Reduced the amount of time it takes to get a rich description, or answers to your questions.
• Reduced the amount of time it takes to get a rich description.
• When using a large accessibility font size, press and hold on toolbar items to see a large content preview.
• On the Product channel, both barcodes and Enhanced QR codes can now be recognized at the same time.
• Plus, various bug fixes under the hood.
